data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Rožaje hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rožaje, Montenegro
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Rožaje to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 377 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Rožaje will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 61 believers in Rožaje to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 22,939 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Turk people might believe through him.
Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Rožaje, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Rožaje, Montenegro that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.section_summary:
the state of Rožaje, Montenegro has a population of 23,000.

We estimate Rožaje has 61 people who might know Jesus, 17,019 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,920 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 377 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 61 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.
